# nw_framer_copy_remote_endpoint(_:)

**Function**

Accesses the remote endpoint of the connection in which your protocol is running.

## Declaration

```swift
func nw_framer_copy_remote_endpoint(_ framer: nw_framer_t) -> nw_endpoint_t
```

## Inspecting Instance Properties

- **nw_framer_copy_local_endpoint(_:)**: Accesses the local endpoint of the connection in which your protocol is running.
- **nw_framer_copy_parameters(_:)**: Accesses the parameters of the connection in which your protocol is running.
